full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 105 of 236 1009 LC3Cmax3 Alessi - cross 1 Q. That wasn't my question, Mr. Alessi. You recall that during your time there, there would be between about 50 and 100 people that were hired to give massages. Do you recall that? 2 A. Sir, I repeat it again, I don't know if they were called to give massages. They were at the house as guests. That's all I know. 3 Q. Okay. Between 50 and 100 people? 4 A. Probably more. 5 Q. And in your view, they all appeared to be over the age of 20; correct? 6 A. Yes, sir. 7 Q. In your view, they could have been 18, 19, 20, or 25; right? 8 A. Yes, sir. 9 Q. Isn't it true that when you were working for Mr. Epstein, you didn't have any doubt that the girls that provided him with massages were not of the proper age; correct? 10 A. Can you repeat the question. 11 Q. When you were working for Mr. Epstein, you didn't have any doubt that the girls who provided him with massages were not of proper age; correct? 12 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I'm going to object to form. 13 THE COURT: Sustained. Can you clarify. 14 MR. PAGLIUCA: I'm trying to be precise with this question for impeachment purposes, your Honor. So I will ask a 15 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012619
